de.hu.gralog.jgrapht
Interface ListenableElement

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultListenableEdge, DefaultListenableVertex, LabeledGraphVertex
public interface ListenableElement
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface introduces listeners for elements (vertices/edges) of a graph. In order for this to work, your graph has to implement ElementListenableGraph.

Author:
Sebastian
